mapper.sql: id, name, no, age, grade,stuclass,reserved1, reserved2
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM st_student WHERE 1=1
AND name like CONCAT('%','${name}','%')
ORDER BY no
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO st_student( name, no, age, grade,stuclass,reserved1, reserved2 ) VALUES ( #{name}, #{no}, #{age}, #{grade}, #{stuclass}, #{reserved1}, #{reserved2} )
mapper.update: UPDATE st_student SET name = #{name}, no = #{no}, age = #{age}, grade = #{grade}, stuclass = #{stuclass}, reserved1 = #{reserved1}, reserved2 = #{reserved2} WHERE id = #{id}
